caption: Figure 13: We show a continuous visualization of how the token representation evolves across layers for all tasks. Each line shows the representational similarity with a pre-defined token, aggregated over 100 sets of examples. We use the token auf for the input, one of {capital, currency, species, baby, color, flavor} for the task, and each run’s ground-truth label for the answer.
description: The chart visualizes the evolution of token representations across model layers, showing the transition from input to task to answer.

description: The chart displays the probability of the last token representation decoding to input, task, or answer vectors across different layers of the model for both text and image ICL.
